list_of_reviews.review_title: Thief agreed to refund but Binance refuse
list_of_reviews.review: I lost USDT from my wallet and deposit was made to Binance. I have been contacting Binance customer support team several times to refund money but they refuses to do it. Thief already agreed to refund and he had a chat with Binance to refund. But Binance refuses to do it. I don't know why they are making work too complicated. They suggested me to report police but they are new to this and hard to handle this. It charges much fee as well. I don't want to make this complicate and hope to resolve without the help of local police.I hope someone from Binance or global law enforcement agency that can resolve this in a short period can contact me.Chat ID: #120805724, #120845562

list_of_reviews.review_title: PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS STEELING EXCHANGE
list_of_reviews.review: Hi,Honestly I thought that Binance  is one of the Best Crypto Exchange Companies, but today I fund out the opposite.I have nothing to gain or loose from this review, but PEOPLE HAVE TO KNOW THE TRUTH.DURING OPEN POSITION, I WAS TAKING SELL SHORT, MY POSITION WAS AUTOMATICALLY CLOSED AND FUNDS STOLEN.THE PERCENTAGE IS ALSO NOT ALWAYS CORRECT ON FUTURES TRADING.WHEN I CONTACTED CUSTOMER SUPPORT THEY TOLD ME THEY DID LIQUIDATION, OF COURSE WHEN WE ARE WINNING MONEY THEY DONT WANT TO GIVE THEM.IN ONE CENTENCE CRIMINAL STEALING PEOPLE!PLEASE DONT USE THIS EXCHANGE YOU WILL GET SCAMMED!YOUR MONEY IS NOT SAFE!!!THEY ARE ALSO GOING TO BE REPORTED TO THE REGULATORY COMMISSION FOR EXCHANGE OFFICE'S.SincerelyChris

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fiat transfers blocked, no reply, many weeks just wasted
list_of_reviews.review: Registered, verified (took about a month!), signed all documents, but then all fiat transfers blocked. Numerous reminders sent, absolutely no reply. Wasted many weeks for being treated like crap!
They are joking with price movement...never seen this before ....just stay away...no need to comment anything every person with eyes can see it from a space

Blocked my incoming transfer because the bank account had the initials: "MR" before my name, so the experts of Binance thought that this was a different person, because my id card didnt write "MR" in front of my name. So they blocked the incoming transfer for months, and I claimed it back from my bank.No matter how many times I have contacted support. Support is useless. they understand nothing.

Do not use binance, they locked my account for no reason from withdrawing funds and did not send me any warnings about it. but sitll allowed me to deposit, so now my funds are stuck on my account and i cant withdraw them.

My feedback is regarding BinanceUS which is the U.S. exchange arm of Binance.I have attempted to open an Institutional account with them which requires submitting business documents for verification.Their standard wait time for approval is 2 weeks and the site recommends to contact support if not completed in this time frame.  It has now been 4 weeks and I have contacted support agents at least 3 times since.  These people (only available via chat) have been completely useless; they cannot provide any information regarding status or timing for approval, or even if anyone has even reviewed any of the documents.They cannot escalate me to anyone who is capable of helping with the issue.  They only claim that someone from their email support team will contact me at sometime in the future but cannot provide any timing for that either.  It has been 2 weeks since my first contact with support and to date I have received no contact whatsoever.  Additionally every agent always end the chat with a flag that says "This issue has been marked as solved" when it clearly is not.

Clearly the best support I´ve seen so far. Besides this Binance is still the most liquid exchange with best limit execution and plenty of assets, way more than in comparison to the most. list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid P2P trading and Binance in general!
list_of_reviews.review: Unfortunately as a UK resident we can seemingly no longer withdraw GBP/Fiat currency across most of not all exchanges (including Binance) due to FCA regulations. Unfortunately that leaves little option but to use a service like Binance P2P trading platform which is littered with blatant scammers. While Binance do provide an arbitrage service in the event a transaction isn't successful, unfortunately they seem marginally complicit in allowing thesescammers onto the platform and seemingly do very little about it. Additionally some of the advice Binance gives with regards chargeback scams is incorrect as the correct way to handle a chargeback if for the sellers bank to refund it, NOT for the seller to generate a separate payment as this is essentially doubling down on the risk of losing the funds as the original payment can still receive a chargeback, which is the advice Binance gave me. All in all I get the impression the scammers profit heavily from P2P platform as even advice like researching feedback is far from foolproof as this can easily be faked to skew/hide the negative one's that highlight the scam.Update: Originally this was a 3* Review, but having spent the past 2 days (and counting) defending my right to have the buyers payment manually sent via my Bank's Fraud department, I'm convinced Binance Customer Service are either complicit of clueless. During the appeals process I've had my account suspended, and get harassed every 4hrs to provide further information even though I've said numerous times nothing can be done until my bank opens Monday. Meanwhile the buyer/probable scammer messages like an impatient child with broken English the whole time. The whole system is a joke considering I raised the appeal yet I'm the one having to defend myself. At this stage I'm fearful Binance will just release the coins to the buyer and he'll raise a chargeback for the remainder. It would also appear that his account is seemingly unrestricted as he continues to operate. I WON'T EVER USE BINANCE AFTER THIS FARCE.

No proper customer care!!I am writing this review on behalf of my friend.To be true it was going good upto last month with Binance but this time fed-up.Last month we took USDT from one of Binance advertiser thru P2P. Amount paid thru UPI and deducted from bank account. Its one month we keep asking to release USDT but not yet released. It was reported to Binance after waiting 3 days but nothing happened.Its one month now, If we are going to report again or appeal, its Binance msg showing that you already reported and under process. I am not sure if the messages / conversation is good to be share on this plateform.

This is very frustrating. Because I just lost my money on binance. Freeze any fraudulent account to teach them a lesson.

I wonder why there is a very strong prejudice against the United Kingdom

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am posting how this company claims to…

Would like to post few pictures given even the link with the password and user name . Since it's a big amount . They asked to keep paying 2 lakh rupees each time and asked to invest . They also informed they I can't connect and one person has whole authority to reject and say your account is more accessible to you and it's in my hand.  If I say you cant make a withdrawal. Since pay 5L more above the 19 lakh Rupees. It's a very big amount as my home and family is suffering to another level.  I red about Biance and did not expect this . Unable to contact biance on the support chat as the link says unreachable. What do I do please help me I have full proof of the transactions and the screenshots .

bad crypto platform. Cannot withdraw my money from the platform because there is a "fee" for who knows what of a few cents. I try to press "deduct now" and it says ERROR. Fow a few cents, you are holding up my accounts? Fraudolent practises.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Yes, you can use Binance without any worries
list_of_reviews.review: I am amazed with the amount of bad experiences here.First of all, i am using Binance since 2019. Trading (i am doing only spot and futures) are working perfectly. Yes, i also had some issues, but those were cause by my own lack of experiences with user interface and settings. Except that, i never had experienced any issues with trading on binance.In terms of Customer support. I had only and only great experiences. I remember one time, when i had to wait maybe 20 minutes, for CS employee to ask for a help his supervisor, but still comes back to me and solved my problem.Recently i noticed, that some part of UI, when you are tryin to withdraw your money in FIAT are a bit hard to orientate in, but still that is nothing to worry about...This is my experience.

The coinmerce transfer failed, after binance confirmed the transfer. Now because the migration closed, they make their problem my problem. They did not notify or contact me in the process. When i'm asking to resolve the issue and expecting me to pay hundreds of euro's of fee's in order to redeem me the coins and giving me extra job to do so. I have been in contact with both parties, but both parties are shielding with eachother. both parties not willing to support, whilst both parties informed me incorrectly

Its a bug or something from their side that is happening too often DO NOT USE BINANCE TO BUY CRYPTO AND STAY AWAY! IM GOING FROM NOW ON TO THE COMPETITORS

Binance has locked my account with a lot of fund for over 4 months now. I have been using Binance for over 2 years and have never violated any of their rules. One day, they suddenly locked my account and refused to allow any fund withdrawals. I provided all the information they requested through the chat window, but they robotically repeat messages, telling me they cannot provide any information about the account review and to patiently wait.I even wrote a letter to Binance's CEO, Mr. Teng, but received no response. Additionally, their customer service is the worst. Despite numerous chats with customer support over 4 months, they mentally harassed me by deflecting issues back and forth and, in some cases, closing the case without resolving the problem, intentionally it seems.The money locked by Binance constitutes a significant portion of my family's finances. My family has been unhappy throughout these periods. Eventually, I fell into depression and had to seek treatment from a doctor due to the mental and financial abuse.This is clearly psychological abuse and financial extortion. I plan to take legal action on this matter and share my dreadful experience on social media. My case number is 121154260. If this issue is resolved promptly, I will update my review.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews commend successful trading and quick withdrawals. In contrast, negative reviews complain about account closures, poor customer service, and technical problems. Reliability and customer support quality are the main differentiators in user experiences.

Improving transparency and support responsiveness is key to maintaining user satisfaction and regulatory compliance.

overall_prompt_summary: Based on the context provided, the company in question has received a range of reviews, indicating a polarized customer experience. Key themes from positive feedback include successful trading experiences and efficient withdrawal processes. Conversely, critical issues highlighted in negative reviews involve account closures without clear explanations, subpar customer service, and technical difficulties that may impede trading. These negative experiences suggest areas for potential improvement, particularly in enhancing customer support and ensuring transparency in account management practices. Further investigation might be warranted to address the root causes of technical problems and to reconcile the discrepancy between the positive and negative user experiences.

Blocked my incoming transfer because the bank account had the initials: "MR" before my name, so the experts of Binance thought that this was a different person, because my id card didnt write "MR" in front of my name. So they blocked the incoming transfer for months, and I claimed it back from my bank.No matter how many times I have contacted support. Support is useless. they understand nothing.

list_of_reviews.review_title: It always take 30 minutes to withdraw…
list_of_reviews.review: It always take 30 minutes to withdraw USDC via AVAX chain even when it's non-congested (as I have tested). Someone should change the the "~2 mins" Arrival Time to 30 mins because incompetent devs cannot stop being incompetent. And users have better stuff to do than waiting 30 minutes for one withdrawal Every. Single. Time.Case ID for reference: 120140056

My feedback is regarding BinanceUS which is the U.S. exchange arm of Binance.I have attempted to open an Institutional account with them which requires submitting business documents for verification.Their standard wait time for approval is 2 weeks and the site recommends to contact support if not completed in this time frame.  It has now been 4 weeks and I have contacted support agents at least 3 times since.  These people (only available via chat) have been completely useless; they cannot provide any information regarding status or timing for approval, or even if anyone has even reviewed any of the documents.They cannot escalate me to anyone who is capable of helping with the issue.  They only claim that someone from their email support team will contact me at sometime in the future but cannot provide any timing for that either.  It has been 2 weeks since my first contact with support and to date I have received no contact whatsoever.  Additionally every agent always end the chat with a flag that says "This issue has been marked as solved" when it clearly is not.

Binance makes getting your money out of their platform harder and harder with every update to the point where successfully navigating their maze-like menus is not possible without contacting support. Support is not professional and poorly trained. This is probably due to the fact that they get laid off every year so Binance can avoid paying out yearly bonuses.Do not put your money on this app.

No proper customer care!!I am writing this review on behalf of my friend.To be true it was going good upto last month with Binance but this time fed-up.Last month we took USDT from one of Binance advertiser thru P2P. Amount paid thru UPI and deducted from bank account. Its one month we keep asking to release USDT but not yet released. It was reported to Binance after waiting 3 days but nothing happened.Its one month now, If we are going to report again or appeal, its Binance msg showing that you already reported and under process. I am not sure if the messages / conversation is good to be share on this plateform.

Clearly the best support I´ve seen so far. Besides this Binance is still the most liquid exchange with best limit execution and plenty of assets, way more than in comparison to the most. The API also allows for massive data transfer in order to be used with external apps, extremely performant. Four stars only since the trading on the integrated platform could really be improved and enhanced by features like tickcharts, quick and precise OCOs, or a simple fullscreen-mode for the trading interface when its used in the browser.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify common themes and issues mentioned in the reviews about binance.com. Summarize the main points of dissatisfaction or satisfaction among users. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common themes in the reviews include poor customer service, issues with account liquidation, incorrect trading percentages, and problems with P2P transactions and institutional account verification. Main dissatisfaction points are automatic position closures, unresponsive support, and delayed transactions.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Examine the reviews over different dates provided and analyze if there are any trends or changes in user sentiment or the types of issues reported over time. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to multiple reviews or their dates to analyze trends or changes in user sentiment. The provided context is a single review, which does not allow for trend analysis.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for binance.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases and words indicating concerns: "funds stolen," "liquidation," "percentage not correct," "difficult to withdraw money," "maze-like menus," "poorly trained support." Praise includes: "best support," "most liquid exchange," "best limit execution," "plenty of assets," "performant API."

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the actual ratings or a distribution of ratings, only the content of one negative review. Therefore, I cannot calculate an average rating or analyze the distribution of ratings to understand general user satisfaction.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Generate concise summaries for each review to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
May 01, 2024 - "Terrible Experience": User claims Binance closed their profitable short position without consent, implying funds were unfairly taken during futures trading.

March 25, 2024 - "Great performance, great support": Positive feedback on Binance's performance and customer support, suggesting a satisfactory user experience.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews often praise performance and customer support, while negative reviews typically involve issues with trading execution, such as unexpected position closures and discrepancies in trading features like futures percentages. Key differentiators are reliability and quality of service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the binance.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews indicate a generally negative perception of Binance's customer support, describing it as unhelpful, unprofessional, and poorly trained, with difficulties in resolving issues related to account verification and withdrawal processes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Based on the review sentiments and contents, predict potential future issues binance.com might face or areas where they could improve. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Binance may face reputational damage due to customer complaints about automatic position closures, incorrect futures trading percentages, withdrawal difficulties, and poor customer support. Improvements could focus on transparent trading mechanisms, user-friendly withdrawal processes, and enhanced customer service training.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify any outliers or unusual reviews that deviate significantly from the general consensus, which might warrant further investigation. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The review in question describes a negative experience with Binance, alleging financial abuse and wrongful liquidation of a position. This deviates from the general consensus if most reviews are positive. The severity of the accusations and the intent to take legal action make it an outlier that warrants further investigation.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of Binance reveal a dichotomy in user experiences, with some customers expressing satisfaction with the platform's performance and customer support, while others encounter significant issues. Common complaints include poor customer service, difficulties with account liquidation, inaccuracies in trading percentages, and problems with peer-to-peer transactions and verification processes. Specific pain points involve automatic closures of profitable positions, unresponsive support, and delays in transactions, which suggest a need for Binance to improve its trading execution reliability and customer service responsiveness. Positive remarks highlight Binance's liquidity, asset variety, and API performance, indicating that when the platform functions as expected, users have a favorable view of its capabilities. To enhance user satisfaction, Binance should address the consistency of its service delivery, particularly in trading execution and support, and ensure transparency and user control in account and position management.
